page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF DARREN
page.content: A typical Wednesday would start off for me at 7.30am. At 8 o'clock I would have breakfast which consists of cereal, bread and apple juice. At 8.30am I set off for school on my bike. I arrive at school and talk with my friends. At 8.50am we go into school and at 9 o'clock we have Assembly. In between Assembly and Playtime we do Maths. At Playtime we play football. Afterwards we do English and then we have lunch at 12 noon. After lunch we use the computer and in the afternoon we sometimes have Games or Art. We have another Playtime at 2.40pm and at 3.20pm we go home. When I get home I change out of my school uniform and go out to play with my friends. At 7.30pm I go swimming and at 9 o'clock I go to bed.
